name: Intellego
description: Intellego is a leading Latin American company in the development of information management solutions and services. We generate value to our customers through innovation in the application of new information technologies. Today Intellego has over 1600 highly trained professionals in various areas of IT solutions consulting, with extensive experience and knowledge of the industry in which they participate, in order to offer our clients the best information management solutions.

locations.address: Avenida Santa Fe No. 1236, Santa Fe
